taskDescription: Of the two vitamins A and C, one is hydrophilic and water-soluble while the other is hydrophobic and fat-soluble. Which is which?
detailedSolution: Vitamin C is water-soluble (hydrophilic); vitamin A is fat-soluble (hydrophilic).
